hiveArticle.title: Fall in Love with Steemit on the very first day
hiveArticle.body:
Hello Great People, I am a Proud Indian working as a developer in the tech hub of India (Bangalore). I am also a blogger who loves to write about technology and programming (www.codingdefined.com).

I am here to show the world that how beautiful is India and why people should visit India. I would be posting beautiful pictures of India. Feel free to reach out to me if you have something to say or if you wanted to know more about India and Indians.
